column1: Little Goat Diner////Our server Melissa was SOOOO sweet
column3: and shy. We liked her. She was dressed like all of the other female servers in cute royal purple dresses with black aprons. There were a LOT of employees: servers
column5: and hosts. I think some of the employees were managers or investors or something. After all
column6: today is only their third day of being open!
